      • Order

        public Order(int id,
             java.lang.String itemName,
             Customer sender,
             Customer receiver,
             java.util.ArrayList<Position> path)
        This is the order constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the order.
        itemName - The name of the order.
        sender - The sender customer of the order.
        receiver - The receiver customer of the order
        path - The planned delivery route assigned to the order.

        public boolean hasBeenSent()
        This method is used to check whether the order has reached the destination been sent.
        Returns:
        Whether the order has been sent or not.

      • reportSent

        public void reportSent()
        This method is used to output the report of sending.

      • nextLocation

        public Position nextLocation()
        This is the next location getter. If the order has already been sent, report it, otherwise get the next location.
        Returns:
        The next position of the order.

      • moveToNextLocation

        public void moveToNextLocation()
        This method is used to move the order to the next location. If the order has already been sent, report it, otherwise move the order to the next location.
